jade-damaging-scale-false-label: Label for an edit which is not damaging
jade-goodfaith-scale-true-label: Label for a good faith edit
jade-goodfaith-scale-false-label: Label for a bad faith edit
jade-contentquality-scale-1-label: Label for this wiki's lowest quality rating.
jade-contentquality-scale-2-label: Label for this wiki's second-from-lowest quality rating.
jade-contentquality-scale-3-label: Label for this wiki's third-from-lowest quality rating.
jade-contentquality-scale-4-label: Label for this wiki's fourth-from-lowest quality rating.
jade-contentquality-scale-5-label: Label for this wiki's fifth-from-lowest quality rating.
jade-contentquality-scale-6-label: Label for this wiki's sixth-from-lowest quality rating. On English Wikipedia the sixth level would be its highest quality "Featured article" but your wiki's scale may have more or fewer levels. Customized labels can be applied on the local wiki, sorry if this breaks TWN integration.
jade-contentquality-generic:
Label for a content quality judgment. This is a fallback which only appears when translations are missing. Parameters:
* $1 - content quality code or level number.
jade-notes-placeholder: Placeholder for the judgment notes field
jade-delete:
Label for the judgment delete button
{{Identical|Delete}}
jade-bad-title-format: Error message for an illegal judgment page title.
jade-bad-title-namespace: Error message when trying to use judgment titles outside of the Judgment namespace.
jade-non-canonical-title:
Error message when a title has a non-canonical form. Parameters:
* $1 - expected title for this target
jade-bad-entity-type:
Error message for an illegal entity type in page title. Parameters:
* $1 - requested entity type
jade-bad-entity-id-format:
Error message for a nonnumeric entity ID. Parameters:
* $1 - requested entity ID
jade-bad-revision-id:
Error message when a revision judgment target cannot be found. Parameters:
* $1 - Revision ID
jade-bad-content-generic: Error message when basic JSON syntax is invalid.
jade-bad-content:
Error message when JSON doesn't conform to judgment jsonschema. Parameters:
* $1 - raw validation exception (English)
jade-too-many-preferred: Error message when more than one judgment is marked "preferred" on a page.
jade-none-preferred: Error message when more than one judgment exists, but none are marked "preferred" on a page.
jade-illegal-schema:
Error message when attempting to use a schema that isn't configured for this entity type.  See $wgJadeAllowedScoringSchemas for your wiki. Parameters:
* $1 - schema name
jade-user-local-id-invalid:
Error message when an endorsement local user doesn't exist. Parameters:
* $1 - attempted user ID
jade-user-central-id-invalid:
Error message when an endorsement central user doesn't exist. Parameters:
* $1 - attempted user ID
jade-user-id-mismatch:
Error message when endorsement user IDs don't match. Parameters:
* $1 - attempted local ID
* $2 - attempted central ID
jade-user-ip-invalid:
Error message when a user IP has an invalid format. Parameters:
* $1 - attempted IP address
jade-created-timestamp-invalid:
Error message for an invalid ISO 8601 timestamp. Parameters:
* $1 - Invalid timestamp
jade-bad-contentquality-value:
Error message when attempting to use a contentquality outside the range of $wgJadeArticleQualityLevels. Parameters:
* $1 - attempted value
* $2 - Number of quality levels on this wiki.
jade-cannot-create-page: Error message when the user isn't allowed to create a judgment page.
jade-cannot-edit-page: Error message when the user isn't allowed to edit a judgment page.
jade-invalid-move-any: Error message when moving judgment pages, when no moves are allowed.
jade-db-error:
Error message for database errors. Parameters:

:$1 - Exception message.
jade-content-model-error: Error message when a document in the Judgment namespace has the wrong content model.
jade-endorsements: Label for a group of endorsements.
jade-user:
Label for a user nick or IP.
{{Identical|User}}
jade-proposalexists: Error message displayed if a proposal with the specified data already exists
jade-proposalnotfound:
Error message displayed when a proposed label cannot be found for endorsement or deletion.  Parameters:
* $1 - The structured data use to identify a proposed label.
jade-endorsementnotfound: Error message displayed when an endorsement cannot be found.
jade-endorsingnonpreferredproposal: Warning message displayed when endorsing a non-preferred proposal.
jade-proposalispreferred: Error message displayed when trying to delete a preferred proposal when it is not the only remaining proposal for a facet.
jade-invalidtitleentitydata: Error message displayed when one of title or entitydata API parameters are not given.
jade-nochange: Error message displayed when the action would result in no change to the Entity.
jade-alreadyendorsed: An error message displayed when a user tries to endorse two different proposed labels for the same facet.
jade-updateendorsement: Bubble notification displayed when a user updates an endorsement.
jade-updateproposal: Bubble notification displayed when a user updates a proposal.
jade-deleteendorsement: Bubble notification displayed when a user deletes an endorsement.
jade-deleteproposal: Bubble notification displayed when a user deletes a proposal.
jade-endorse: Bubble notification displayed when a user endorses a proposal.
jade-createandendorse: Bubble notification displayed when a user creates and endorses a proposal.
jade-setpreference: Bubble notification displayed when a user promotes a proposal.
jade-moveendorsement: Bubble notification displayed when a user moves an endorsement.
jade-createandendorseproposal-autocommen: Edit comment prefix on MW history page when a user creates and endorses a proposal.
jade-deleteproposal-autocomment: Edit comment prefix on MW history page when a user deletes a proposal.
jade-updateendorsement-autocomment: Edit comment prefix on MW history page when a user updates an endorsement.
jade-updateproposal-autocomment: Edit comment prefix on MW history page when a user updates a proposal.
jade-deleteendorsement-autocomment: Edit comment prefix on MW history page when a user deletes an endorsement.
jade-endorseproposal-autocomment: Edit comment prefix on MW history page when a user endorses a proposal.
jade-setpreference-autocomment: Edit comment prefix on MW history page when a user promotes a proposal.
jade-moveendorsement-autocomment: Edit comment prefix on MW history page when a user moves an endorsement.
jade-number-of-endorsements-autocomment: Edit comment prefix on MW history page that shows the number of endorsements.
jade-editquality-is-comment: Edit comment part with facet name on MW history page.
jade-productive-good-faith-comment: Edit comment part with Productive / Good-faith label data on MW history page.
jade-damaging-good-faith-comment: Edit comment part with Damaging / Good-faith label data on MW history page.
jade-damaging-bad-faith-comment: Edit comment part with Damaging / Bad-faith label data on MW history page.
jade-by-ip-address-comment: Edit comment part with user ip address on MW history page replaced with link to special contributions.
jade-by-id-number-comment: Edit comment part with user id replaced with username on MW history page.
jade-rcfilters-group-title: Title for the filter group for Jade contribution quality labels.
jade-rcfilters-group-whats-this-header: Jade filter group 'How do these work?' popup content header
jade-rcfilters-group-whats-this-body: Jade filter group 'How do these work?' popup body text
jade-rcfilters-group-whats-this-link-tex: Jade filter group 'How do these work?' popup link text
jade-rcfilters-group-productivegoodfaith: Label for the Jade filter Productive/Good-faith.
Description for the Jade filter Productive/Good-faith.
jade-rcfilters-group-damaginggoodfaith-l: Label for the Jade filter Damaging/Good-faith.
jade-rcfilters-group-damaginggoodfaith-d: Description for the Jade filter Damaging/Good-faith.
jade-rcfilters-group-damagingbadfaith-la: Label for the Jade filter Damaging/Bad-faith.
jade-rcfilters-group-damagingbadfaith-de: Description for the Jade filter Damaging/Bad-faith.
jade-rcfilters-group-unlabeled-label:
Label for the Jade filter Un-labeled.

"Un-labeled" means that it doesn't have a label.
jade-rcfilters-group-unlabeled-desc: Description for the Jade filter Un-labeled.
prefs-betafeatures: Used as tab title for beta features in [[Special:Preferences]]
prefs-jade: Label for the Jade user preferences in [[Special:Preferences]]
jade-hide-elements-on-secondary-integrat: Description for the user preference that enables users to opt-out of showing Jade on secondary integration pages.
